data.actual_result: The hitbox of the autocorrect bar drops as the emoji picker pops up, so you hit the autocorrect word as the hitbox drops, creating :HAPPY 10000 BUG REPORTS 🎉🎉🎉
data.short_description: iOS autocorrect gets in the way of emoji
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to iOS settings and set the “t” key to autocorrect to “HAPPY 10000 BUG REPORTS 🎉🎉🎉” (or in reality, any string) - Test to make sure it works (meaning, typing "t" should output your string) - Go into a Discord text channel - Type :r
